TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: Provides methods and properties that expose basic information about a UI element.

span.span: Provides methods and properties that expose basic information about a UI element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在簡單的項目，例如按鈕的 UI 自動化提供者，可以實作這個介面。This interface can be implemented on UI Automation providers for simple elements such as buttons. 它也提供額外屬性或控制項模式，或覆寫現有的屬性或項目已經有預設的提供者上的控制項模式提供者上實作。It can also be implemented on providers that contribute additional properties or control patterns, or override existing properties or control patterns, on an element that already has a default provider. 複雜的項目提供者必須實作或。Providers for complex elements must implement or .

Public Function GetPatternProvider (patternId As Integer) As Object

summary.span: Retrieves an object that provides support for a control pattern on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

span.span: Retrieves an object that provides support for a control pattern on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

returns.span: Object that implements the pattern interface, or if the pattern is not supported.

span.span: Object that implements the pattern interface, or if the pattern is not supported.

summary.span: Retrieves the value of a property supported by the UI Automation provider.

span.span: Retrieves the value of a property supported by the UI Automation provider.

returns.span: The property value, or a if the property is not supported by this provider, or if it is not supported at all.

span.span: The property value, or a if the property is not supported by this provider, or if it is not supported at all.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者應傳回只有它會明確隱藏的屬性值，而且該要求不是傳遞到其他提供者。A provider should return only if it is explicitly hiding the property value and the request is not to be passed through to other providers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的實作自訂按鈕控制項。The following code example shows an implementation of for a custom button control. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostRawElementProvider As IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: Gets a base provider for this element.

span.span: Gets a base provider for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是自訂控制項的視窗的 UI 自動化提供者。This property is the UI Automation provider for the window of a custom control. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 使用此提供者搭配您的提供者實作控制項裝載在視窗中。 uses this provider in combination with your provider implementation for a control hosted in a window. 例如，執行階段識別項的項目被取自主機提供者。For example, the run-time identifier of the element is obtained from the host provider. 傳回主機提供者時，必須依照下列任何情況下：A host provider must be returned in any of the following cases: - 此元素為片段的根。This element is the root of a fragment. - 元素是簡單的項目，例如按鈕。The element is a simple element such as a pushbutton. - 提供者會重新調整的預留位置。The provider is a repositioning placeholder. 在其他情況下，此屬性應該傳回`null`。In other cases, the property should return `null`. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼顯示實作裝載在 Windows form 中的片段根。The following example code shows an implementation of for a fragment root that is hosted in a Windows form. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderOptions As ProviderOptions

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies characteristics of the UI Automation provider; for example, whether it is a client-side or server-side provider.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies characteristics of the UI Automation provider; for example, whether it is a client-side or server-side provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 以不同方式處理不同類型的提供者。 treats different types of providers differently. 比方說，從伺服器端提供者的事件已廣播給所有接聽的使用者介面自動化用戶端程序，但是從用戶端提供者的事件保留在該用戶端程序。For example, events from server-side providers are broadcast to all listening UI Automation client processes, but events from client-side providers remain in that client process. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼顯示實作伺服器端 UI 自動化提供者。The following example code shows an implementation of for a server-side UI Automation provider. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#104)]
